entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries later this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
